extractors.balanceGreaterThan: (params) => { const amount = parseFloat(balance.replace(/[^0-9.-]/g, '')); return amount > params.amount; }
extractors.hasMinimumBalance: (params) => { const amount = parseFloat(balance.replace(/[^0-9.-]/g, '')); return amount >= params.minimum; }
extractors.hasRecentTransaction: () => { if (!lastTransactionDate) return false; const date = new Date(lastTransactionDate); const daysSince = (Date.now() - date.getTime()) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24); return daysSince < 7; }

supportedClaims.name: balanceGreaterThan
supportedClaims.description: Proves PayPal balance is greater than specified amount

supportedClaims.name: hasMinimumBalance
supportedClaims.description: Proves PayPal account has minimum required balance

supportedClaims.name: hasRecentTransaction
supportedClaims.description: Proves account has transaction within last 7 days

supportedClaims.name: currencyCheck
supportedClaims.description: Proves account currency matches expected value
